sqlMap.select: SELECT G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ, G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE, G.GIS_ASSETS_CD, G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_SE, G.PRT_FCLTY_NM, G.PRT_FCLTY_STNDRD, G.PRT_FCLTY_UNIT, G.PRT_FCLTY_INSTL_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_CHANGE_DT, G.PRT_FCLTY_MNG_ENTRPS_CD, G.PRT_FCLTY_AR, G.PRT_FCLTY_EXPR_DT, G.INFO, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_CNT, G.PRT_PRT_FCLTY_MNGER, G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_SUB, G.FCLTS_MNG_NO , E.PRPOS , E.CAPA , E.VOLT , E.OUTPUT , E.FMT , E.STNDRD , TO_CHAR(E.INSTL_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') INSTL_DT , TO_CHAR(E.MFC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') MFC_DT , E.MFC_CMPNY , E.MANAGER , E.USAGE_ENTRPS , E.DUCT_LINE_LT , E.CABLE_EXT , E.LIGHTWR_HT , E.QY , E.FUEL_CONSUM , E.FUEL_TANK , E.OIL_QTY , E.FNL_MTHD , E.SPPLY_PWR , E.SPPLY_TR , E.KOR_ELEC_SUBSTN , E.SECTION_FROM , E.SECTION_TO , E.PREMAIN_HT , E.PREMAIN_STNDRD , E.PREMAIN_QY , E.LIGHTAPP_FMT , E.LIGHTAPP_STNDRD , E.LIGHTAPP_QY , E.LAMP_FMT , E.LAMP_CAPA , E.LAMP_QY , E.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_QY , E.LIGHTWR_LIGHTAPP_CLCD , E.LIGHTWR_LAMP_QY , E.LIGHTWR_LAMP_CLCD , E.RM , E.FCLTS_MNG_NO , E.LOC , E.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO , (SELECT PRT_FCLTY_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_MNG_NO = E.ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO) ARCH_FCLTS_MNG_NO_NM , E.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD , (SELECT FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM FCLTS_CL_CD_F WHERE FCLTS_CL_CD = E.ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD) ELCTY_FCLTS_CL_CD_NM FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G LEFT OUTER JOIN ELCTY_FCLTY_SPEC_F E ON G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = E.FCLTS_MNG_NO WHERE 1=1 AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe#

SELECT F.ATCH_FILE_SEQ , F.ATCH_FILE_SJ , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_LOGIC , F.ATCH_FILE_NM_PHYSICL , F.ATCH_FILE_SE , GAM_GET_FILE_SE_NM(F.ATCH_FILE_SE) AS ATCH_FILE_SE_NM , TO_CHAR(F.ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ATCH_FILE_WRITNG_DT FROM GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD_F G, FCLTS_SPEC_ATCH_FILE_F F WHERE G.FCLTS_MNG_NO = F.FCLTS_MNG_NO AND G.GIS_ASSETS_PRT_AT_CODE=#gisAssetsPrtAtCode# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_CD=#gisAssetsCd# AND G.GIS_ASSETS_SUB_CD=#gisAssetsSubCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_CD=#gisPrtFcltyCd# AND G.GIS_PRT_FCLTY_SEQ=#gisPrtFcltySeq# AND G.PRT_FCLTY_SE=#gisPrtFcltySe# ORDER BY ATCH_FILE_SEQ
